scripts.ios:dev: npm run ios:full-reset && APP_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development react-native run-ios
scripts.ios:prod: npm run ios:full-reset && APP_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production react-native run-ios --configuration Release
scripts.ios:reset: cd ios && rm -rf Pods Podfile.lock && pod install && cd ..
scripts.ios:full-reset: npm run ios:clean && npm run ios:reset
scripts.bundle:ios: npx react-native bundle --platform ios --entry-file index.js --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle:android: npx react-native bundle --platform android --entry-file index.js --dev false --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.build:ios:prod: npm run bundle:ios && ENVFILE=.env.production xcodebuild archive -workspace ios/YourApp.xcworkspace -scheme YourApp -configuration Release -sdk iphoneos -archivePath ios/build/YourApp.xcarchive
scripts.release:ios: npm run build:ios:prod && npm run export:ios:prod
scripts.build:android:prod: npm run bundle:android && ENVFILE=.env.production ./android/gradlew -p android assembleRelease
scripts.bundle:android:prod: npm run bundle:android && ENVFILE=.env.production ./android/gradlew -p android bundleRelease
